cofh.lib.item

Interface IContainerItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICoFHItem, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEnergyContainerItem, IFluidContainerItem, IXpContainerItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockItemEnergyCell, BlockItemFluidCell, EnergyContainerItem, EnergyContainerItemAugmentable, FluidContainerItem, FluidContainerItemAugmentable, FluidReservoirItem, PotionInfuserItem, PotionQuiverItem, RFCapacitorItem, RFDrillItem, RFMagnetItem, RFPumpItem, RFSawItem, WateringCanItem, XpContainerItem, XpCrystalItem

    public interface IContainerItem
extends ICoFHItem
    Marker interface for anything that supports the "Holding" enchantment. Can also be done via the Enchantable capability, but this is way less overhead.
